thread.title: EU referendum: Scottish and SNP lessons for UKIP
thread.title_full: EU referendum: Scottish and SNP lessons for UKIP - BBC News

author: BBC
title: EU referendum: Scottish and SNP lessons for UKIP
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device EU referendum: Scottish and SNP lessons for UKIP 22 October 2015 Last updated at 17:46 BST
There could be lessons for UKIP, and those wanting to leave the EU, from last year's Scottish referendum, which saw a surge in SNP support.
Reporter Ellie Price heard from the University of Strathclyde's Prof John Curtice and Matthew Goodwin from the University of Kent.
They look at whether UKIP could follow in the SNP's footsteps after the 2014 vote, and how the upcoming EU referendum could decide the party's future.
Read more Daily Politics and Sunday Politics highlights of 2015 SNP 'has referendum benchmark', BBC learns SNP conference 2015: Sturgeon says big election win may not lead to referendum
